member.name: IWriteSpeedDescriptor.get_MediaType
member.summary: Retrieves type of media in the current drive.
member.param: Type of media in the current drive. For possible values, see the enumeration type.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IWriteSpeedDescriptor.get_RotationTypeIsPureCAV
member.summary: Retrieves the supported rotational-speed control used by the recorder for the current media.
member.param: Is VARIANT_TRUE if constant angular velocity (CAV) rotational-speed control is in use. Otherwise, VARIANT_FALSE to indicate that another rotational-speed control that the recorder supports is in use.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

member.name: IWriteSpeedDescriptor.get_WriteSpeed
member.summary: Retrieves the supported write speed for writing to the media.
member.param: Write speed of the current media, measured in sectors per second.

returns.para: S_OK is typically returned on success, but the return of other success values is possible. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:
